mapper.select: SELECT jd.JOB_NAME AS jobName, jd.DESCRIPTION AS jobDescription, jd.JOB_GROUP AS jobGroupName, jd.JOB_CLASS_NAME AS jobClassName, t.TRIGGER_NAME AS triggerName, t.TRIGGER_GROUP AS triggerGroupName, FROM_UNIXTIME(t.PREV_FIRE_TIME/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS prevFireTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(t.NEXT_FIRE_TIME/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS nextFireTime, ct.CRON_EXPRESSION AS cronExpression, t.TRIGGER_STATE AS triggerState FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS jd JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS t JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ct ON jd.JOB_NAME = t.JOB_NAME AND t.TRIGGER_NAME = ct.TRIGGER_NAME AND t.TRIGGER_GROUP = ct.TRIGGER_GROUP
